column3: 2015) view/ create memorial website send sympathy card connie a. hunt passed away sunday morning at ball memorial hospital in muncie. she was 56. born october 10
column6: she was the daughter of william norris hunt
column7: jr. and joyce ann wagner hunt. she attended school at fort branch and graduated from gibson southern high school
column8: class of 1978. survivors include; her father
column11: larry (sherry) hunt of crawfordsville and jeff hunt of west terre haute; one sister
column13: as well as several nieces and nephews. she was preceded in death by her mother and grandparents. family and friends can pay their respects wednesday
column14: june 10th from noon to 2 pm at burkhart funeral home. services will begin at 2 pm
column15: led by pastor everett davenport. burial will follow at roachdale cemetery. memorial contributions may be made to assist the family through burkhart funeral home
column18: in 47933. online condolences may be made at www. burkhartfh. com. print back express your condolences contact us get mobile version privacy terms of use 2006 - 2015 burkhart funeral home funeral home website by batesville
